name: Othello：Daynight Time Clash
description:
Game Introduction


Relations between the kingdom of Polar Day and the realm of the Eternal Night are very tense, for their difference in beliefs.Yet the two incarnations ---- the two queens, yet unbreakable bonds had long been established between the two incarnations ---- the two queens. So lets gorget about the "countries"……Let's Othello!



Transcending time and space -- Nymphs from all dimensions, emerge and engage!

The Othello game have 10 characters available.



Online matching & Friend Versus are also supported.
